fields.headline: Pick of the week: Jazz
fields.bodyText: John Etheridge Spin Jazz Club, The Wheatsheaf Hotel, Oxford, Saturday 2; The Guildhall, Brecon, Friday 8 Deceptively vague guitarist, solo tonight and together with Arild Andersen and John Marshall on Friday. The Blessing Eastnor Castle, Ledbury Saturday 2 New BBC Jazz Awards Best Album prize-winners have antecedents in free jazz and the trip-hop of Portishead.
